title: Is going to a doctor Shirk as cure comes only from Allah? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: Afiya says if someone is sick and if we say to them go to the doctor inshallah is this comes under shirk because we say this is with intention that they go to the doctor to have medical or medicines they will be cured of definitely this is not shirk the Prophet Allison ordered us when he said seek cure for your illnesses and choose not medicines that are Haram so the Prophet is the one who told us to seek medical attention so there's no shirking that
